title: Lineker: BBC director general Tim Davie's interview in full
content: This video can not be playedGary Lineker will return to BBC screens this weekend after reaching a deal with the corporation.The BBC will begin an independent review of its social media guidelines, focusing on how it applies to freelancers outside news like Gary Lineker.BBC News media correspondent David Sillito speaks to the corporation's director general, Tim Davie.
